Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ExpertMatch.CharacterCards

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ExpertMatch.CharacterCards.CharacterCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, Baker, Banker, Chef, Friar, Herbalist, Jester, Knight, Magician, Messenger, Minstrel, Princess
public abstract class CharacterCard extends Observable implements Serializable
Abstract class implemented by all cards
